description:
0-2 is a Foddian type platformer created for Ludwig's Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/ludwig-2021).  It was the first game jam/try at game dev for all of us, and we really enjoyed the experience.

If you die 4 times you go 0-1 and restart the level.  If you go 0-2 and lose twice you will have the restart the entire game.  Like in a double elimination tournament

Github

https://github.com/JasonZhu95/LudwigGameJam

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Shift - Dash
  • Space - Jump
  • Control - Climb
  • E - Interact/Next
  • ESC - Pause

Credits

  • Programming - Jason "JZhu" Zhu, Ted "Haidoumo" Liang
  • Art - McCain "McCain" Duong
  • Sound - Sean "Spoocy" Oreta

Attributions/Used Assets

  • Tilesets
    • Cavernas by Adam Saltsman (https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas)
    • Deep Night (https://v3x3d.itch.io/deep-night)
  • Music
    • Kevin Macleod
      • Beauty Flow
      • Chill Wave
      • Magic Forest
      • Outfoxing the Fox
      • At Rest
    • 64 Sundays - Twin Musicom
